## Parameter exercise
Parameters of a document are defined in the YAML header, and can pre-populate an Rmarkdown document. To see this in action, download this file for a parameterization activity.
  
1. Download the [parameter activity file](www/objects/6-parameter_activity_file.Rmd)  
2. Move it to an Rstudio project directory  
3. Open the file, and follow these instructions  
-- Click the dropdown menu next to Knit and use Knit with Parameters to render the document  
-- Change the parameter values to match your age and gender, and re-knit.
